SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETFINANCIALSPONSOR_BYSPONSORSHIPOPP
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the Constituent ID of the financial sponsor
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETFINANCIALSPONSOR_BYSPONSORSHIPOPP ( @sponsorshipOpportunityID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin
declare @financialSponsor uniqueidentifier = null
if @sponsorshipOpportunityID is not null select @financialSponsor = REVENUE.CONSTITUENTID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT on REVENUESPLIT.ID = SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.REVENUE on REVENUE.ID = REVENUESPLIT.REVENUEID
where SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active and SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = @sponsorshipOpportunityID
return @financialSponsor end
